metadata.title: EE, Inc. USMC Once A Marine Always A Marine Pin Military Collectibles for Men Women, Small
description: This United States Marine Corps pin has the USMC logo in the center and proudly states "Once A Marine, Always A Marine" on the outside edge. Wear this pin and let everyone know that even though you may be out of the service, you'll never stop being a Marine! Great for lapels, jackets, vests, hats, and more!
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "2.83 x 2 x 0.24 inches; 0.35 Ounces", "Item model number": "4331251821", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "April 23, 2015"}
